title: Draft Display - Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* There should be a Draft Display viewer LDAP. 
* A user must have this LDAP to see the "Draft Display" tab on the Rule 4 dashboard. 
* LDAP is added to the new permissions wiki.

title: Draft Day - Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* There should be a Draft Day viewer LDAP. 
* There should be a Draft Day editor LDAP. 
* A user must have one of these two LDAPs to see the "Draft Day" tab on the Rule 4 dashboard. 
* LDAPs are all added to the new permissions wiki.
* Club users with the viewer role should see the Club version of the tab. If they are viewers, they see no action buttons. If they are editors they have the applicable action buttons.
* BOC users with the viewer role should see the BOC version of the tab. If they are viewers, they see no action buttons. If they are editors they have the applicable action buttons.

title: Post Draft - Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* There should be a Post Draft viewer LDAP. 
* A user must have this LDAP to see the "Post Draft" tab on the Rule 4 dashboard. 
* LDAP is added to the new permissions wiki.

title: Connectivity - Permissions
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* There should be a Connectivity viewer LDAP. 
* A user must have this LDAP to see the "Connectivity" tab on the Rule 4 dashboard. 
* LDAP is added to the new permissions wiki.

title: As a Club user I want the correct population of players to be loaded into the Available Players screen for the upcoming Rule 4 Draft
custom_steps:
Acceptance Criteria: 
* If the Available Players table is loaded per story #154730573, then the players listed in the Available Players table should be: 
  * Only players that have a R4 Draft Status of "Eligible" for the current Draft Year.
  * Only players that do NOT have a player status of Professional. 
  * Only players that have an Origin of "Re-Draft", "MLSB" or the currently viewing Org.
  * Players who have multiple entries by different Orgs for the current draft year should display the information submitted by the currently viewing club, regardless of if there is a BOC Copy.

title: As a BOC user I want to view the Draft Day screen when the draft is not in progress
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_draft_day_-_not_started

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1423+Data+Discovery+-+BOC+Draft+Day

Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a "Draft Day" tab available under the "Rule 4 Draft" dashboard.
* The browser tab should read "Rule 4 Draft Day"
* Clicking on the "Draft Day" tab will load the Draft Day tab. 
* If the draft is NOT in progress, and the system is past the "Flip Draft to Following Year" system date, there is a "Start Draft" button. 
* The Draft Day tab matches the provided wireframe.

title: As a Club user I want to be able to quickly filter the Available Players list
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_available_players_enabled

Acceptance Criteria: 
* When viewing the Available Players widget, there is a "type to filter" entry point on the screen - visible at all times. 
* Typing in this filter box will filter down the Available Players screen to only show the rows that contain the text entered into the box (in any column). 
* Erasing the text in this box will return the full population of players.
* After 1 character is typed an x icon appears to the right of the input, clicking the x removes whatever text has been typed.

title: As a Club user I want to view the Draft Day screen when the draft is not in progress
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_all_features_disabled

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Draft+day+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a "Draft Day" tab available under the "Rule 4 Draft" dashboard.
* The browser tab displays "Rule 4 Draft Day"
* Clicking on the "Draft Day" tab will load the Draft Day tab. 
* If the draft is NOT in progress, and the system is past the "Flip Draft to Following Year" system date, the Draft Day tab matches the provided wireframe.

title: As a Club user, I want my Available Players widget to be Activated
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_available_players_enabled

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Draft+day+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
 - When the "Enable Available Players widget" system date is reached, the Available Players list will become populated and active
 - The Show Drafted Players toggle will still be disabled
 - The screen will match the provided wire

title: As a Club user, I want my Pick Queue to be Activated
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=club_draft_day_-_pick_queue_enabled

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Club+Draft+day+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
 - When the "Enable Pick Queue" system date is reached, the Pick Queue will become active
 - The Show Drafted Players toggle will still be disabled
 - The screen will match the provided wire

title: As a user I want to view the Post Draft screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=draft_history

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/EBIS4-UC-1522+Data+Discovery+-+Post-Draft

Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a "Post Draft" tab available under the "Rule 4 Draft" dashboard.
* Clicking on the "Post Draft" tab will load the Post Draft tab, featuring the Draft History widget. 
* The browser tab will display "Rule 4 Post Draft"
* This shows the prior year's Rule 4 Draft by default. 
* The Draft History matches the provided wireframe. 
* Changing the year dropdown at the top will display the selected year's data. 
* The default sort will be descending by overall pick.
* There will be 3 Global Filters for the widget (all multi-select):
  - - Round
  - - Org
  - - Position
* Widget will be able to be exported to both excel and PDF

title: As a user, I want to view the Draft Display tab when the draft is not in progress
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=draft_display_-_draft_not_started

Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a "Draft Display" tab available under the "Rule 4 Draft" dashboard.
* Clicking on the "Draft Display" tab will load the Draft History. 
* The Draft Display matches the provided wireframe. 
* There are no actions to be taken if the draft is not in progress

title: As a BOC User, I want to view the Connectivity Screen
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=boc_connectivity

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Connectivity+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria: 
* There is a "Connectivity" tab available under the "Rule 4 Draft" dashboard.
* The browser tab should read "Connectivity"
* Clicking on the "Connectivity" tab will load the Connectivity tab. 
* The Connectivity screen matches the provided wireframe.

title: As a BOC User, I want to view the Connectivity Details
custom_steps:
Wireframe:
https://mej987.axshare.com/#p=connection_details

Data Discovery:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Connectivity+-+Data+Discovery

Acceptance Criteria:
 - Clicking anywhere in the Org's box will open the Connection Details screen for that Org 
 - Clicking on the BOC's number will open the Connection Details popup for the BOC
 - The popup will be displayed in the middle of the user's screen and will show all of that clubs Draft Users connected to the draft
 - If there are too many users to fit in the popup, there will be a scroll bar
 - Connectivity is based on whether any user who has permissions to submit players for draft for that club is logged in and has a Rule 4 page open
 - Clicking the close button or the 'x' icon will close the popup and return the user to the Connectivity screen

title: As a User, I want to run the Signing Scout Report
custom_steps:
Report Layout: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Signing+Scout+Report+Layout

Report Details: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Signing+Scout+Report+Details

Report Logic: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=118480082

Report Prompts: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Signing+Scout+Report+Prompts

Acceptance Criteria: 
* The above documentation, and any additional required documentation, will be completed for the report so that the report may be built out. 
* Logic used to populate the report in ebis1 should be extracted and documented in the above documentation. 
* The logic found as well as the provided documentation should be used to create a view for the reporting team so that they can deliver the report. 
* Delivery of an export of the data generated by running the 2017 Signing Scout Report for comparison to ebis1.

* The report will have an LDAP associated with it. Please provide the LDAP when the story is delivered and a user id to test the report and security with.

title: Verify that TIL Notification is working properly
custom_steps:
Clipboard requirements: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/IL+-+Notifications+and+Action+Items

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Gina requested that we add a new notification for the BOC users if a player is on the TIL for more than 7 days - but we should have already added that.

Is this broken?

title: As a user I want to be warned if I'm transferring a AA or AAA player to a SA or R roster
custom_steps:
Business Rules #:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/9.+Transfer

Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Minor+Assignments+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" for a Transfer should check to see if the transfer is moving a AA or AAA player to a Rookie or Short Season team. 
* If yes, display a warning. Messages #52. 
* The warning should also appear as a flag for the BOC on their Approvals Clipboard, and a transfer with this flag should never be auto-approved. 
* If no, no warning is displayed and the transfer may be auto-approved if it meets all other auto-approval conditions.

title: As a user I want to see an error on submitting a Reinstate from IL if the player coming off the Temporarily Inactive List has been there for more than 14 days
custom_steps:
Business Rules 19.22.2: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/19.+Reinstate+from+Inactive+List

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/IL+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" on a Reinstate from Inactive List, only for Reinstatements from the Temporarily Inactive List, should verify that the Reinstatement date is not more than 14 days after the Placement Date of the Temporarily Inactive List placement transaction.
* If the reinstatement date is more than 14 days after the placement date, display error #37. This should be a hard error for Clubs and overrideable by the BOC.

title: As a user I want to see an error on submitting a TIL placement if the Org will have 5 players on the TIL
custom_steps:
Business Rules #18.14: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/18.+Place+on+Temporarily+Inactive+List

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/IL+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" on a Place on Temporarily Inactive List transaction should check if the player's Organization already has at least 4 players currently on the Inactive List for a Temporarily Inactive List placement. (In other words, with a MN Roster status of "Temporarily Inactive")
* If yes, display error #36. This should be a hard error for Clubs and overrideable by the BOC.
* We do not need to take into account pending Placements or Reinstatements for this. 
* This is by the Org, not the Club.

title: As a user I want to be warned if I'm transferring a player an excessive number of times
custom_steps:
Business Rules #9.04:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/9.+Transfer

Messages:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Minor+Assignments+-+Messages

Acceptance Criteria: 
* Clicking "Submit" or "Approve" for a Transfer should check to see if the player being transferred has been transferred at least two other times within the 7 days prior to the current transfer's date. (All based on the transaction date of each transfer)
* If yes, display an error. See Messages #53.
* The error should always display, even if comments have been entered, but entering comments should allow the Club user to override this message.
* The BOC should always be able to override this message. 
* The warning should also appear as a flag for the BOC on their Approvals Clipboard, and a transfer with this flag should never be auto-approved. 
* If no, no warning is displayed and the transfer may be auto-approved if it meets all other auto-approval conditions.
